Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Flight Directors, Engineers, Astronauts and, Ramp rats.......

Picked the game up again and, i am very pleased. Loving the career mode cant wait for it to evolve some more.
Hello PorkChop808. So you are a returning player?
Yes, i played during the early days of the beta.
These are the middle days of the alpha.
What do you call it before it's alpha?

Welcome (back) to the forums, and glad to hear you've been enjoying yourself

You're probably an old pro at flying rockets, but if you need to dust off a few of the cobwebs, or if you need help figuring out any of the newer features, feel free to ask questions here on the forums.

These are the middle days of the alpha.

srry pre alpha is what i ment..... i think..... i got it when it first came out on steam.
